summary: Worried that he has gotten the free-spirited Mindy pregnant after an unprotected one-night stand, Fred feigns romantic interest and sticks by her side for twelve hours to make sure she takes both doses of the morning-after pill.
cast: Noah Bean|Rachel Boston|Anna Chlumsky|Jean Brassard|Al Thompson|Dreama Walker|S. Lue McWilliams|Rob Yang|Julia Royter|Jack Tartaglia
title: The Pill
